Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 15 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Maul, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 20 Bludgeoning and can knock prone

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dao makes 2 Fist attacks or 2 Maul attacks

Abilities.Ability 1: Earth Glide, The Dao can burrow through the earth leaving no trace of its passage
Abilities.Ability 2: Elemental Demise, If the Dao dies, its body disintegrates into a crystalline powder
Abilities.Ability 3: Innate Spellcasting, The Dao can cast a number of Earth themed spells
Abilities.Ability 4: Sure-Footed, The Dao has advantage on saving throws against effects that would knock it prone
